hr.h2: Verndale Public School ISD # 818 ... Home Of The Pirates

span.span: The mission of the Verndale Public School District is to provide a safe environment where students are prepared for an ever-changing world through educational excellence.

p.span: |DELIVERY MENU | PIRATE TV | BULLETIN | PIRATE POST | SIGN UP FOR THE PIRATE POST |

img.alt: High Reliability School Level 2 Certification Picture

p.span: The Verndale School is now Level 1 and Level 2 certified as a High Reliability School. They are proud to be 1 of only 2 schools in the state of Minnesota with this certificatioin.
